response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high value and potential impact on your projects, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 12000}
